snippet: A lawyer says he and other lawyers were tortured in detention in Jiansanjiang in Heilongjiang Province, where they tried to draw attention to the incarceration of Falun Gong adherents.
abstract: A lawyer says he and other lawyers were tortured in detention in Jiansanjiang in Heilongjiang Province, where they tried to draw attention to the incarceration of Falun Gong adherents.

headline.main: Lawyers Say They Were Tortured After Protesting 'Black Jail'
